attributes.action: Award a posthumous knighthood to Bobby Moore, World Cup winning captain of Englend
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A posthumous knighthood for Bobby Moore, captain of the World Cup winning football team in 1966

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
